input: Execute a complex batch request to retrieve detailed information for multiple account holder change requests, specifying different select parameters for each.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankAccountContractAccountHolderChangeRequests/12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef?$select=NewAccountHolderPartyIdentifyingElements,BusinessProcessChainAssignment HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankAccountContractAccountHolderChangeRequests/22334455-6677-8899-aabb-ccddeeff1122?$select=ReasonCode,ChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
